Koga Shuko/Sixshot/Serpentor/Unitron/Anubis/Hades:



Sixshot caught all the blasts, nearly blowing in half, transforming to his 
carrier mode, slamming to the ground, raising both batteries in the back of 
his current mode, each having four cannons inside, and two on the edges.  
Raising the batteries, Sixshot fired 8 bolts from one side at Transantulas, 8 
bolts from the other at Black Arachnia.

---

Shuko went flying through the air, slamming to the ground five feet back.  
Raising his launcher, he fired a rocket off at Ramapge.

---

Serpentor sidesteps, letting Jackle fly by.  Raising a missile launcher, he 
fired a rocket at Jackle's back.

---

Unitron transforms into his robot mode, the missiles barely missing him.  
Transforming into a tank mode, he slams into the ground, firing a concussion 
rocket from his cannon at Gremlin, his mounted machine gun firing 20 shells 
off at Scourge, and the smaller cannons on the front of his tank mode firing 
two missiles at Vulois' treads.

---

Anubis dodges one of the rockets, another blowing off his left hand.  Raising 
his launcher, he fired off a rocket at a downed Marine, as autogun fire 
struck him.

---

Hades grunts as rifle fire strikes him, kicking the grenade away, its 
explosion knocking him back a foot, firing three optic blasts at Gremlin's 
left knee.
